meanings: (밑으로) fall, drop; (액체가) drip; (지니고 있던 것이) slip
(가격·물가·수준 등이) fall, drop, go[come] down, decline, decrease
steps that are hard to take

vlive.korean: 하늘에서 떨어졌을 때 다쳤냐고요? "Did you get hurt when you fell down from the heaven?" 듣기 View video GOT7 : 🌼
vlive.english: "Did you get hurt when you fell down from the heaven?"

vlive.korean: 이거 '우린 어느 별에서 떨어져 둘이 됐을까?' "Which star did we fall from that we became two?" 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩 뒤집어지는 LIVE
vlive.english: "Which star did we fall from that we became two?"

vlive.korean: [틀리면 처음부터 리셋] - 5분이야 어차피 천천히만 하자 - 중간에 떨어져도 괜찮죠? [Reset when they make a mistake] - 5 minutes. - It's okay that we make a mistake, right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
vlive.english: [Reset when they make a mistake] - 5 minutes. - It's okay that we make a mistake, right?

vlive.korean: 맛이 떨어졌나? It's out of it? 듣기 View video NCT : 엥????
안 떨어지겠지? It won't fall, right? 듣기 View video iKON : 같이 운동하자!!

examples.korean: The pandas become less resistant to disease and are not as healthy. 발음듣기 판다는 점점 질병에 대한 면역력이 떨어지며 전보다 건강이 나빠지고 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: The pandas become less resistant to disease and are not as healthy. 발음

examples.korean: As the mercury plunges to its annual lows, those of us at higher latitudes retreat to cozy shelters. 발음듣기 기온이 1년 중 최하로 떨어지며 고도가 높은 지역에 사는 생물들은 이들만의 아늑한 잠자리로 숨어든다. Neungyule
examples.english: As the mercury plunges to its annual lows, those of us at higher latitudes retreat to cozy shelters. 발음

examples.korean: During a yawn the head tilts back, the jaw drops, the eyes squint and the brow wrinkles. 발음듣기 하품을 하는 동안 머리는 뒤로 젖혀지고 턱은 아래로 떨어지며, 눈은 약간 감겨 가늘어지고 눈살이 찌푸려집니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: During a yawn the head tilts back, the jaw drops, the eyes squint and the brow wrinkles. 발음

examples.korean: It falls to the ground faster and doesn't stay in the air as long as the ash from the Eyjafjallajokull eruption did.' 발음듣기 이 화산재는 빠르게 지상으로 떨어지며 대기 중에 떠있는 시간이 에이야프얄라요쿨보다 짧은 편이다.' Neungyule
examples.english: It falls to the ground faster and doesn't stay in the air as long as the ash from the Eyjafjallajokull eruption did.' 발음

examples.korean: Temperatures will drop to -10 degrees Celsius tomorrow evening and blizzard conditions will prevail into the night. 발음듣기 내일 저녁 기온은 섭씨 영하 10도까지 떨어지며 밤 사이에는 전역에 걸쳐 눈보라가 예상됩니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Temperatures will drop to -10 degrees Celsius tomorrow evening and blizzard conditions will prevail into the night. 발음
